text: Jane Roberts (May 8, 1929 â€“ September 5, 1984) was an American author, psychic and trance medium who "channeled" a spirit named Seth. The publication of the Seth books established her as an important person in the world of the paranormal. She wrote short stories, novels and children's books. ==Selected writings== * Roberts, Jane (1974). The Nature of Personal Reality. Amber-Allen Publishing. * Roberts, Jane (1981). The Individual and the Nature of Mass Events. Amber-Allen Publishing. * Roberts, Jane and Robert F. Butts (1994). Seth Speaks: The Eternal Validity of the Soul. Amber-Allen Publishing. title: Jane Roberts
